To transform continuous probabilities of suitability into binary (0/1) values, we calculated a common threshold (cut-off) value for both the baseline period and the 2080 period using a binary vector of observed occurrence and a vector of probability of occurrence from the average model (WAP
i 2080 ). We searched for the threshold which jointly maximized sensitivity and specificity ( Liu et al., 2005). This approach is considered among the most reliable for choosing a threshold ( Freeman & Moisen, 2008).
